name: Allods Online
description: This is the german installer of Allods [My.com Game Center].This Setup makes use of DirectX 9 Vulkan Layer [D9VK] and runs with high fps.
notes:
- Switched to legacy setup from 2019/08 (Otherwise Setup fails with OS not supported)
- You can switch Language after Setup in Gamecenter
- Everything works so far (even display of numbers / text in chat window)

task.description:
Installing Allods My.Com
------------------------------
Let Lutris installer finish first. Log in afterwards.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setup: https://gremgoll.de/files/AllodsdeLoader_de.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/GameCenter/GameCenter.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating 32bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win32
    description: Install MS Core-Fonts with winetricks
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Wine to Windows 7 32-Bit
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: 'Installing Allods My.Com

      ------------------------------

      Let Lutris installer finish first. Log in afterwards.'
    exclude_processes: GameCenter.exe Launcher.exe
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: gpuload
  exclude_processes: GameCenter.exe Launcher.exe
wine:
  dxvk: true
